pr_title: DDF-6245 Remove catalog-ui features from etc/application-definitions/search-ui.json and update the default search redirect to /search/simple

timeline.message:
DDF-6245 Remove catalog-ui features from etc/application-definitions/search-ui.json and update the default search redirect to /search/simple

- because catalog-ui is no longer included in DDF

timeline.bodyText: There aren't any configs for this bundle right now, but any future configs should belong in this app. It doesn't hurt to have this here now, and I think it makes the purpose of this file clearer and this file more maintainable.

timeline.bodyText:
📉 Note: Other projects that install another search UI will need to

modify this file for new configurations to show up under the Search UI app in the old Admin Console.
update the Redirect URI configuration to point to the new uri
